content: {A惊讶}Ah, hello there, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Mors and the creatures are all settled in. From now on, he'll be working on ecological observation with you.

content: {A思考}The goods from Loomi Co. have been shipped... <style=SizeSmall>But cars and houses will only arrive the following day at the earliest.</style>

content: With a thriving ecosystem like this, there's no need to worry about living well. That gives me the chance, hoho~, to offer you even more help and support...

content: {A观察高处}It's getting late, and you've had a busy day. How about we take a break and gather together? Two newcomers have just arrived, and it's a great chance to get to know each other.
info: 聚餐之前-莫白_主流程文本

content: Hoho, I'll gather everyone and have them prepare the food, so we can wrap up the day together.

content: Hoho, no problem. When you're free, just come see me anytime. I'll gather everyone and have the food ready.
